property.name: spark.yarn.scheduler.heartbeat.interval-ms
property.description: The interval in ms in which the Spark application master heartbeats into the YARN ResourceManager

property.name: yarn.nodemanager.aux-services
property.description: shuffle service that needs to be set for Map Reduce to run

property.name: yarn.nodemanager.aux-services.spark_shuffle.class
property.description: This class is defined in $SPARK_HOME/yarn/spark-3.0.1-yarn-shuffle.jar and should be copied to $HADOOP_HOME/share/hadoop/yarn/lib

property.name: spark.yarn.shuffle.stopOnFailure
property.description: Whether to stop the NodeManager when there's a failure in the Spark Shuffle Service's initialization. This prevents application failures caused by running containers on NodeManagers where the Spark Shuffle Service is not running.
